title: 832. Out of the Depths - Psalm 130
verses: Out of the depths I have cried to You, O Lord;

Lord, hear my voice!
Let Your ears be attentive
To the voice of my supplications.

If You, Lord, should mark iniquities,
O Lord, who could stand?

But there is forgiveness with You,
That You may be feared.

I wait for the Lord, my soul waits,
And in His word I do hope.

My soul waits for the Lord
More than those who watch for the morningâ€”
I say, more than those who watch for the morning.

nd He shall redeem Israel
From all his iniquities.
